column3: 2015 at 9:00 a.m. at Costello-Greiner Funeral Home
column4: 44 Green Street at Barron Avenue in Woodbridge. A Funeral liturgy will take place at 10:00 a.m. at Saint Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church
